title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. CC, pt. 8002 - Parole Release
content:

§ 8002.1 - Parole release interview
§ 8002.2 - Parole release decision-making
§ 8002.3 - Post-interview requirements and considerations
§ 8002.4 - Victim impact statement
§ 8002.5 - Rescission
§ 8002.6 - Parole violator re-release
§ 8002.6 - Parole violator re-release, version 2
§ 8002.7 - Guidelines and procedures for the placement of certain sex offenders in the community

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. CC, pt. 8002

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §§ 259, 259-b[11], 259-c[11]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
